product.title: Unbranded Flat Iron Comb Attachment Clip On, Grip for Iron, Hair Straightener Comb, Black
product.title_excluding_brand: Flat Iron Comb Attachment Clip On, Grip for Iron, Hair Straightener Comb, Black
product.description:
Super time-saving: Still holding your hair straightener in one hand and your comb in the other? ? It's time to streamline your styling routine! Our flat iron comb attachment clip on allows you to straighten your hair quickly and efficiently with just one hand, say goodbye to steam and burnt fingers. It can effectively reduce the time by 1 times, allowing your boyfriend to reduce the waiting time for appointments.
Damage-free styling: Our comb attachment for flat iron leaves strands smooth, straight and stress-free. Its gentle process reduces heat damage, leaving your hair looking naturally luscious and healthy.
High Temperature Material: Our flat iron comb attachment is made of the most advanced high temperature material and can withstand temperatures up to 500°! After extensive testing, it not soften or melt even under prolonged high temperature conditions, keeping the comb and adhesive intact, and not be troubled by material deterioration during use. You don't have to worry about heat damage or material damage.
Portable split design: Our hair straightener comb attachment features a clever split removable design that fits a variety of straightener sizes. Easily disassembled, easy to carry and store, especially suitable for use when traveling and does not take up much space. You can maintain your perfect hairstyle anytime and anywhere, making straight hair styling more convenient.
CHOICE: The flat iron comb attachment clip on is a practical and innovative gift that ensures she can easily achieve the straight hair of her . Whether it's a birthday , holiday celebration, or special occasion, this gift shows your care and thoughtfulness while saving you both precious time on your romantic date

Colour: Black
Material: Plastic

Package Contents:
1 set Flat Iron Comb
2 x Nylon Sticker

Only the above package content, other products are not included.
Note: Light reflection and different displays may cause the color of the item in the picture a little different from the real thing. The measurement allowed error is +/- 1-3cm.
